nodes.text: The Daupherm Planet States was an alliance of planets that was extant during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
The Daupherm Planet States contained more than 30 star systems inhabited by Humans known as the Dauferim.

They maintained a military, with which they conducted a long war against the Botor Enclave. Among the citizens of the Daupherm Planet States were Evram Darkmere, Garreck Darkmere and Gorvan Shrulldike.
The Botor Enclave and the Daupherm Planet States eventually joined the Galactic Republic in its early days with an Allied Region status.
With the vacuum of power caused by the defeat of the Galactic Empire at the Battle of Endor, both the Botor Enclave and the Daupherm Planet States declared their independence.
